snippet: Mike Krzyzewski and his assistants are figuring out the best way to communicate as the United States plays for the FIBA World Cup gold medal against Serbia.
abstract: United States men's basketball coach Mike Krzyzewski and assistants Jim Boeheim, Tom Thibodeau and Monty Williams are figuring out the best way to communicate as the US plays for the FIBA World Cup gold medal against Serbia; creating a new language that everyone is comfortable with is part of the unique approach to coaching that USA Basketball has used with the senior national team.
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski and his assistants are figuring out the best way to communicate as the United States plays for the FIBA World Cup gold medal against Serbia.

headline.seo: At FIBA World Cup, U.S. Team Is Working to Improve Communication
headline.main: Unique Mix of Coaches Strives for One Voice
